ch03.section_4

Class BankAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch03.section_4.BankAccount

  • public class BankAccount
extends java.lang.Object
    A bank account has a balance that can be changed by deposits and withdrawals. It also has an account number and the name and address of the account owner.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      BankAccount(double initialBalance, java.lang.String name, Address address, int accNumber)
      Constructs a bank account with an account number, an account owner and a given balance
      BankAccount(java.lang.String name, Address address, int accNumber)
      Constructs a bank account with an account number, an account owner and a zero balance

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deposit(double amount)
      Deposits money into the bank account.
      int getAccNumber()
      Gets the account number.
      Address getAddress()
      Gets the address of the account owner.
      double getBalance()
      Gets the current balance of the bank account.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Gets the name of the account owner.
      void setAddress(Address address)
      Changes the address of the account owner
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      Sets a new name on the account.
      void withdraw(double amount)
      Withdraws money from the bank account.
